text:
<@U06RQGQ27A6>
We are working with tasks associated to a company. Here's the trigger. Note that this will only work once per company according to the docs. re-enrollment on the same criteria needs to happen manually.
I want to send emails to buyers and as well as seller. When any buyers fills a form to show interest of seller items, How can i do in HubSpot

What is your data structure looks like for buyers and seller?

do you have custom objects?
Yes for few which are dealers, not for the private seller
